description: This game is easy to get into and works well. The trouble is that it doesn't offer much. You use the arrow keys to navigate a small spaceship around a single screen. The gameplay, graphics, and sound are very simple. The game reminds me of some of the simpler computer games of the 80s.

Asteroids are a little haphazard, being hit AS you make a first descent is no fun, maybe add a timer?? No clues given on what to do if you lose the rescue ship (escape past 5000 altitude). Volume controls would be appreciated, not just on and off. No explanation for rescue ships random accelerations, especially if they speed into an asteroid or force you off the refuel pad as you are refuelling and Boom). Would like to see warning on fuel gage, turning red and a warning sound maybe.
So far average, otherwise solid game. Wasn't enthused to get passed 100% on first base.
summary: Reasonable game, could be addictive if refined
